back.text:
Root: ق و ل (Q-W-L)
Meaning: Say
Pronunciation: Qul
Tajweed Rules: **Qalqalah** on the final 'ل' (Lām) when stopping. The 'ق' (Qāf) is a heavy letter.
Derived Words:
1. قَال (Qāl): He said
2. قَوْل (Qawl): A saying
Example Ayah: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

hint.text: The command to the Prophet (peace be upon him).

back.text:
Root: ك ف ر (K-F-R)
Meaning: The disbelievers
Pronunciation: Al-Kāfirūn
Tajweed Rules: **Alif-Lām Qamariyyah** and **Madd Tabi'i** on the 'كَا' and 'رُو'.
Derived Words:
1. كُفْر (Kufr): Disbelief
2. كَافِر (Kāfir): A disbeliever
Example Ayah: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ

hint.text: The people being addressed in the Surah.

back.text:
Root: ع ب د (ʿ-B-D)
Meaning: I worship
Pronunciation: Aʿbudu
Tajweed Rules: The 'ع' (ʿAyn) is a middle throat letter.
Derived Words:
1. عَبْد (ʿAbd): A servant, slave
2. عِبَادَة (ʿIbādah): Worship
Example Ayah: إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ

hint.text: The action of serving and worshipping Allah.

back.text:
Root: ع ب د (ʿ-B-D)
Meaning: You worship
Pronunciation: Taʿbudūn
Tajweed Rules: **Madd Tabi'i** on the 'دُو'.
Derived Words:
1. عَبْد (ʿAbd): A servant
2. عِبَادَة (ʿIbādah): Worship
Example Ayah: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ

hint.text: The action of the disbelievers that the Prophet disassociates from.

back.text:
Root: د ي ن (D-Y-N)
Meaning: Your religion
Pronunciation: Dīnukum
Tajweed Rules: **Madd Tabi'i** on the 'دِي'.
Derived Words:
1. دِين (Dīn): Religion, way of life
2. دَائِن (Dāʾin): A creditor
Example Ayah: إِنَّ الدِّينَ عِندَ اللَّهِ الْإِسْلَامُ

hint.text: The final statement affirming separation of faiths.
